name: Angelic Descent PS3 controller version
description: Angelic Descent is Action Adventure Arcade game.  Where the whole point of the game is to try to obtain coins from money, chests, and coins to beat each level to go on to the next.  All the while enemies are constantly spawning in.  To stop the little angelic brain from stealing the money.  Only the bravest will make it to the end.  Try me if you dare.
